img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in combat with an enemy named "Green-Capped Martialist." The setting is a rocky, snow-covered landscape with a large cliff and overhanging tree branches. The player character is wielding a weapon and surrounded by fiery projectiles. The interface displays health and stamina bars, along with various icons indicating abilities or items. The enemy's name and health bar are visible, suggesting a boss fight or significant encounter.
